snippet.title: Omaku - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Omaku is a project i've been working on for some time but now is on hold, it's a top down adventure game, with an open interconnected world. The game focuses on simplicity, only one button is needed for attacking and interacting, and builds upon this simplicity with interactive environment. Collect moontears to open new doors , gather "souls" for upgrades and just explore freely, there is not set path, make your own.

-This video was done 4 months ago, it was not planned to be public so it was unlisted until now, but since i've taken a break from this game and i am not sure if it's gonna get continued... I decided to make it public.

https://ambientmelancholy.itch.io/
